alert.note: Alert for Central Willamette Valley; Northern Oregon Cascade Foothills (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 02 at 3:52PM PDT by NWS Portland
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHWESTERN CLACKAMAS COUNTY THROUGH 430 PM PDT... At 351 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Molalla, or 18 miles south of Oregon City, moving northwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Molalla. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle. Persons in campgrounds should consider seeking sturdy shelter until this storm passes.

area.areaDesc: Central Willamette Valley; Northern Oregon Cascade Foothills
